subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: FYI and more FYI
author: Joeine C.
full_text:
---1488538659-84309383-1327785818=:53743
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

All of this is just another example of=C2=A0 how the "spiritually enlighten=
ed"=C2=A0 love to devour and feed off of each other.
=C2=A0 

IS THIS WHERE=
 YOU LIVE? 
"No, I live in heaven, and my affections
are there. I just borr=
ow this shack while
waiting for my ride home."

--- On Sat, 1/28/12, don po=
well <dpowell7299@...> wrote:


From: don powell <dpowell7299@yahoo.c=
om>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: FYI and more FYI
To: "EVP-ITC@...=
m" <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Saturday, January 28, 2012, 2:12 PM



=
=C2=A0 





=C2=A0
How come I'm not seeing these negative emails?=C2=A0 Hm=
m, maybe my yahoo mail client has a positive only filter :)
=C2=A0
Personal=
ly, I'm just on here to listen to other recordings.=C2=A0 Even though I bui=
lt a Frank's Box, I have not had time to really work with it.
=C2=A0
Althou=
gh I'm amazed that people keep up the negative stuff when it really does no=
t matter.=C2=A0 What matters is the cool stuff these boxes are capable of o=
r whether or not they actually work.=C2=A0 What does NOT matter is who star=
ted it.
=C2=A0
Of course I know *I* did not start it so I don't have a dog =
in that fight (as it were).
=C2=A0
Still, if you want to argue about someth=
ing, argue about whether the phenonomen is real or not.=C2=A0 I'd be intere=
sted in reading those flame wars ))
=C2=A0
Don





From: Urkel23 <urkel23@=
aol.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, January 27, 2012 6:56 P=
M
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: FYI and more FYI



=C2=A0 


I'm sitting here min=
ding my own business and i'm dragged into yet another negative post.

This =
used to be a great group and an original for this field, about 6 years ago =
before anybody knew about ghost boxes a few of us were here doing our resea=
rch and posting our stuff. 

Just look in the archives to see the activity =
we use to have here. It's true, i do use this group mainly to allow fellow =
enthusiasts to own a decent box at a cheap price. 

There are 900 people he=
re to target, although there never is a post anymore. 

Me and others do al=
l of our posting at my RTSC yahoo group, where i help individuals daily wit=
h advice and links to FREE downloads and ideas to test and try.

Despite wh=
at frank says, i never claimed to invent anything or say he didn't. That al=
l came from his brain and it was all made up.

All i did was add a function=
 generator kit for $10 to a radio to make it sweep. I got the idea from Ric=
h Georgina on my group, that wasn't my idea either.

All these things are a=
ll documented everywhere with me giving all the credit to Bill Chappel, fra=
nk, rich, joe.

Somehow franks lies went mainstream about me. If you don't =
believe what i'm saying, i have all this FREE information documented on my =
site for 6 years now. I have never made any money off of anybody and i offe=
r everything for Free on my site including all the hacks i did and how to m=
ake your own ghost boxes with a sweep circuit. I even have the links on whe=
re to get the parts to build them cheap.

So before you post something else=
 negative, do your homework on who people are and what they have contribute=
d without any fame in mind or monetary motives.

-Steve H.

--- In EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com, "Country" <countrybumpkin1956@...> wrote:
>
> Just wanted =
to let everyone know who thinks they created the ghost box that I just fini=
shed reading another book, 101 Ways To Find A Ghost by Melissa Martin Ellis=
, printed in 2011. In her book she mentions the creator of the ghost box an=
d the name in print is Frank Sumption, not Urkel /ultay or anyone else.
> 
=
> This should please Frank but instead he will probably be mad and bitter a=
bout something. He does not seem to look at the good in this group or the g=
ood in life. In some areas I think this group has gotten way off course as =
to the original reason for starting the group.
> 
> Also, as far as I can s=
ee Urkel/hultay uses this group to promote whatever boxes he has for sale, =
eBay or otherwise. Then we have the others who heve a signature trailer of =
paragrapgh length on anything and everything they offer (for a fee of cours=
e).....private frank box sessions? That almost sounds like another chris mo=
on, spirit medium? What does that have to do with this group that was creat=
ed becuz of ghost box research?
> 
> This group seems to have fallen apart =
and the expletive words in every 3-4 message doesnt help. I really have had=
 enuf at this point.
> 
> Good luck, Misty, hang on as long as u can :) lif=
e is too short to try and keep a bunch of "I am better than anyone else" ha=
ppy and in line, meaning doing ghost box research.....
> CB
> 
> 
> --- In =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Country" <countrybumpkin1956@> wrote:
> > Obvious=
ly I am way behind in my message reading on this group, I also rarely post =
for fear of being attacked by someone as well. Anyone who has been involved=
 with EVP - whether radio sweep, digital recorder, Digital Dowsing gadgets,=
 etc etc etc - knows that Frank Sumption was the leader in radio sweep. Why=
 do you have to be so angry and continually use the F word. Every ghost or =
paranormal book I have read ( and I have well over 100 on my bookshelf) giv=
es credit to you, Frank, and every paranormal or ghost magazine has given c=
redit to you when there are articles about using radios for paranormal inve=
stigation. As i said earlier, most educated people in radio evp know who cr=
eated the wheel in this area. So why do you let a tiny little yahoo group a=
nd a few uneducated posters bother you, which in turn upsets the rest of us=
.
> > 
> > CB
>
